Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class PlayerView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.PlayerView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PlayerView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a view of the Player class to the Client. It implements serializable so that it can be serialized in the messages that client and server exchange: this way, the client won't have access to the Model objects.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerView

      public PlayerView​(Player player)
      PlayerView constructor. PlayerView attributes are set to the values of the same attributes of the Game Object received as an argument.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player represented by this PlayerView

    • PlayerView

      public PlayerView​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String color, CardView godCard, boolean hasLost)
      PlayerView constructor. PlayerView attributes are set to the values received as arguments.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Player represented by this PlayerView
      color - the color of the Player represented by this PlayerView
      godCard - the God Card assigned to the Player represented by this PlayerView
      hasLost - true if the Player represented by this PlayerView has lost, false otherwise

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public java.lang.String getId()
      Returns:
      the ID of the Player represented by this PlayerView

    • getColor

      public java.lang.String getColor()
      Returns:
      the color of the Player represented by this PlayerView

    • getGodCard

      public CardView getGodCard()
      Returns:
      the CardView representing the God Card assigned to the Player represented by this PlayerView

    • hasLost

      public boolean hasLost()
      Returns:
      true if the Player represented by this PlayerView has lost, false otherwise
